Notes

"Moon Over Bourbon Street" was inspired by "Interview With A Vampire" by Anne Rice. Mixed at Blue Wave Recording Studios, St. Philip, Barbados and Le Studio, Morin Heights, Quebec. Includes fold-out insert with graphics and lyrics.
